name: @imhoff/google-fonts-downloader
description: Specify a Google Fonts Stylesheet URL and get a directory of font assets.

scripts.build: ncc build src/index.ts -e axios -e commander -e css -e lodash/fp -e user-agents -o dist
scripts.lint: pnpm run eslint && pnpm run prettier --check
scripts.fmt: pnpm run eslint --fix && pnpm run prettier --write

author: Daniel Imhoff <dwieeb@gmail.com>
